attributes.action: Call for Overhaul & Reform of the Driver and Vehicle Standards Agency & its Role
attributes.additional_details:
Introduce
-Learners taught by family/friend to have a minimum no. of proven lessons with an Approved Driving Instructor prior to driving test
-DVSA driving test examiners to have a minimum 3 yrs ADI experience & 5 yrs to conduct Part 2/3 tests
-ADIs standard to be based on pupil pass rates, if they fall below a national average for 2 yrs they take a Check test
-Grant PDIs a 12 mth licence with pass rate considered for the Part 3 ADI test
-ADI’s to pursue complaints against the DVSA through a tribunal
attributes.background: Call for overhaul & reform of the DVSA which needs to work from reliable data/statistics when introducing reforms & changes in order to improve road safety https://assets.publishing.service.gov.uk/government/uploads/system/uploads/attachment_data/file/848485/road-casualties-year-ending-june-2019.pdf
